title: The Story of a Stroppy Princess - Novel Updates
genre: Harem   Historical   Josei   Martial Arts   Romance
tags: Amnesia   Ancient China   Cunning Protagonist   Divorce   Female Protagonist   Genius Protagonist   Mysterious Past   Reverse Harem   R*pe   Ruthless Protagonist   Schemes And Conspiracies   Strong Love Interests   Transmigration   Weak to Strong
author: Jiǒng Jiǒng Xiǎo Yā   囧囧小丫
description:
The daughter of Prime Minister is a nympho?

The brutish Prince is her husband?

The stroppy Princess wants to kick her husband off the marriage sedan?!

“Shit! I want a divorce!”

“Why?!”

“You can’t satisfy me in bed!”

The next day, Prince Chennan becomes the laughingstock of the whole Kingdom of Dayue.

How Hua Yueling, the Stroppy Princess with a soul from 21st century, will create her legendary story in this ancient world?>
